parameter.name: workaroundServletSink
parameter.label: Workaround For Servlet-Based Audiosink
parameter.description: Enable this workaround to store temporarily the file on disk. Needed if you play on audiosink based on the openHAB audio servlet.

parameter.name: speakingRate
parameter.label: Speaking Rate
parameter.description: Controls how fast the voice speaks the text. A value of 1 is the speed of the training dataset. Less than 1 is faster, and more than 1 is slower.

parameter.name: audioVolatility
parameter.label: Audio Volatility
parameter.description: The amount of noise added to the generated audio (0-1). Can help mask audio artifacts from the voice model. Multi-speaker models tend to sound better with a lower amount of noise than single speaker models.

parameter.name: phonemeVolatility
parameter.label: Phoneme Volatility
parameter.description: The amount of noise used to generate phoneme durations (0-1). Allows for variable speaking cadance, with a value closer to 1 being more variable. Multi-speaker models tend to sound better with a lower amount of phoneme variability than single speaker models.
